attributes.action: Bring Back The Birch As An Effective Punishment
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I urge the Government to bring back the birch as an effective punishment, at the disposal of our courts. The people of Britain have had enough of sneering thugs getting away with callous acts of assault, vandalism, cruelty, and a whole plethora of crimes. Even when caught and dealt with by the courts the punishments received are no deterrent to committing crime’s again in the future, and usually no more than an insult to the victim. 
It’s time to wipe the callous smirking grins off of these thugs’ faces once and for all, and for the British public to have the protection of a punishment that really would deter criminals, The Birch.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
